title: C-22 Adhesive Remover Solvent Spray
body_html:
Walker Tape C-22 Solvent is the ultimate solution to your hair system needs. Widely considered as the best hair system solvent on the market, it's not just any ordinary solvent - it is the most popular and fastest working skin-safe solvent, ensuring that you get the results you need in no time.

With its oil-based formula, Walker Tape C-22 Solvent is safe for all systems and has a fresh citrus scent, making it an ideal choice for people who are looking for both quality and fragrance.

It's worth noting that Walker Tape C-22 Solvent is a great fit for stylists looking for a fast and efficient breakdown speed. However, it is essential to keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light to maintain its quality. Store it in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F), and make sure to close the bottle lids tightly for added protection.

Moreover, with proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months, so you can enjoy the benefits of C-22 Solvent for an extended period.

When it comes to effectiveness, this citrus solvent is unrivaled. It is highly effective on most tapes and soft bonds, making it an excellent solution for your hair system needs. Not only that, it has a fresh-smelling citrus fragrance, which makes the process more enjoyable. It is also very gentle on the skin and easily rinses off with soap and water, ensuring that your skin stays healthy and moisturized.
In conclusion, Walker Tape C-22 Solvent is the ultimate solution to your hair system needs. Its effectiveness, safety, and fragrance make it an ideal choice for anyone looking for a reliable hair system solvent.


Benefits of using Walker Tape C-22 Solvent for Hair Systems

  • Citrus Scent

  • Fast-acting Skin-Safe Solvent

  • Oil-Based Formula that Rinses Easily with Soap and Water

Ingredients:

The solvent contains Organic Wetting Agents, Petroleum Hydrocarbons, Citrus Oils, and Lanolin.

How to Use Walker Tape C-22 Solvent for Hair Systems

Instructions:

  • Spray on adhesive area and leave for 1-5 minutes depending on adhesive buildup.

  • Wipe or brush off residue.

  • Shampoo and rinse.

We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

Tips for Doing a Solvent Soak Using Walker Tape C-22

  • Fill a large bowl or sink with C-22 Solvent.

  • Place the system into the solvent, base side up.

  • Keep the system submerged and work the adhesive build-up off.

  • Wear gloves to keep your hands out of direct contact with the solution.

  • Shampoo the system and rinse.

  • Soak times vary from 5-30 minutes, depending on the type of system and adhesive used.

Cautions When Using Walker Tape C-22 Solvent

  • Flammable
